xhtml:div.label: Force Blastp mode (default Blastx) (-p) Yes No
Force Blastn mode (default Blastx) (-n) Yes No
Make gapped alignment of ungapped-MSP contigs (-G) Yes No

Set coverage limit (-l)?
0 = No coverage rejection
Use old step cutoffs for adjacency instead of the new continuous system. (-O) Yes No
Don't reject any MSPs (-w) Yes No
Report only rejected MSPs (-r) Yes No
Reject all matches with less than this % identity (-I)
Reject all matches with length less than this value (-L)
Reject all matches with E-value higher than this value (-e)

fieldset.legend: Read in query seq (for rereading .seqbl files) (-Q)

xhtml:div.label: Coverage limitation requires whole contig to be covered (always for Blastp) (-a) Yes No
Accept hits to self (-s) Yes No
Ignore hits to earlier seqnames (for All-vs-All) (-A) Yes No
Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring X residues. (-j) Yes No
Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring mismatches at ends. (-J) Yes No
Do Statistics of Silent mutations (only cDNA!) (-S) Yes No
Print statistics on used matrices (-E) Yes No
Print all Expected scores (default only when positive) (-X) Yes No
Line length of Wrapped alignment (-W)
Big Picture output (-P) Yes No
For Big Picture output, force all matches to the same subject on one line (-F) Yes No
Produce SFS output (-H) Yes No
Produce seqbl output for Blixem (-q) Yes No
Indicate query insertions with numbers (For seqbl output from Wublast) (-N) Yes No
Produce .ace output (for ACEDB 4) (-4) Yes No
Don't mirror (i.e. print the subject object) in ACE4 format (-M) Yes No
Produce exblx output (for easy parsing) (-x) Yes No
Produce exbldb output (as exblx with query names) (-d) Yes No
Produce fasta output (unaligned, for mult.alignm.) (-2) Yes No
Print 3 frame translation (blastn only) (-3) Yes No
Print footer with parameters and stats (-f) Yes No
Print percentage identity (seqbl output only) (-i) Yes No
Output coverage stats? Yes No
Produce output for Domainer (trim overlaps) (-D) Yes No
